chapter.text: haneul-i sansanhi gallajigo
junimkke sunjonghamyeo uimuleul dahadoda
daejiga pyeonpyeonhage pyeolchyeojigo
geuan-ui modeun geos-i naedeonjyeojieo teongbige doemae
junimkke sunjonghamyeo uimuleul daha doda
ingandeul-iyeo sillo neohuiga junim eul hyanghae nolyeoghanani neohuineun geubun eul mannal geos-ila
geuui gilog-i oleun son-e issneun janeun
geuui gilog-i pyeon-anhi gyesandoeni
gippeohamyeo geuui gajog-eulo dol-aganola
geuleona geuui gilog-i dwie issneun janeun
jug-eum-eul hyanghayeo solichil geos-i ni
geuneun taoleuneun buljiog-eulo deul-eoganila
sillo geuneun geuui mulideulgwa jeul geohi banghwang haess-eul ppun
hananim-egelo gwiuihalila saeng gagji ani haessnola
geuleohji anhnola sillo junimkke seoneun ingan-eul jikyeobogo gyesinila
haejil ttaeui hwanghon-eul dugo maeng sehasa
bamgwa moyeodeun modeun geos-eul du go maengsehamyeo
wanjeonhi chaoleun dal-eul dugo maeng sehanani
sillo neohuineun han sanghwang-eseo daleun sanghwang-eulo olmgyeo ganila
geuleom-edo geudeul-i midji ani halyeo han geos-eun museun il-inyo
kkulan-i geudeul-ege nangsongdoena buboghayeo gyeongbaehaji anihamyeo
ohilyeo geugeos-eul geojis-ila bul sinhadeola
geuleona hananim-eun geudeul-ui sim jung-e gamchugo issneun modeun geos-eul asi nani
geudeul-ege gotongseuleoun beol-i iss-eul geos-ilaneun geos-eul gyeong-gohala
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haengha neun uiloun jadeul-egeneun danjeoldoeji anhneun yeong-wonhan bosang-i iss-eul geos-ila
